class.name: SpinBox

method.name: apply
method.description: Applies the current value of this [SpinBox].

method.name: get_line_edit
method.description: Returns the [LineEdit] instance from this [SpinBox]. You can use it to access properties and methods of [LineEdit]. [b]Warning:[/b] This is a required internal node, removing and freeing it may cause a crash. If you wish to hide it or any of its children, use their [member CanvasItem.visible] property.

members.member: If [code]true[/code], the [SpinBox] will be editable. Otherwise, it will be read only.
Adds the specified [code]prefix[/code] string before the numerical value of the [SpinBox].
Adds the specified [code]suffix[/code] string after the numerical value of the [SpinBox].
Sets the value of the [Range] for this [SpinBox] when the [LineEdit] text is [i]changed[/i] instead of [i]submitted[/i]. See [signal LineEdit.text_changed] and [signal LineEdit.text_submitted].

theme_items.theme_item: Sets a custom [Texture2D] for up and down arrows of the [SpinBox].
